h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - First Prince of Flowing Sands
content: If you try dodging around and attacking from the side, be aware that he can either use a quick tail swipe to stagger you, or swing his arm back quickly to draw you away from flanking him, so don’t get too comfortable.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley of Despair' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - First Prince of Flowing Sands'.
The content is as follows:
If you try dodging around and attacking from the side, be aware that he can either use a quick tail swipe to stagger you, or swing his arm back quickly to draw you away from flanking him, so don’t get too comfortable.
